verbose_text: At a mean of 33 months, ticagrelor (60 mg) reduced the incidence of cardiovascular death, MI, or stroke (7.77 vs. 9.04%) at the expense of increased thrombolysis in myocardial infarction (TIMI) major bleeding (2.30 vs. 1.06%) and a neutral effect on overall mortality.
evidence: mg) reduced the incidence of cardiovascular death, MI
